title: Hour 3 - Ric Bucher
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Ric Bucher
description:
The crew questions if the Lakers have the courage to trade Anthony Davis for Kyrie Irving. Will the Browns figure out something to do with Baker Mayfield, or was this a poorly mismanaged situation? Ric Bucher then joins to talk Finals, whether the Celtics should blow up the team and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
